definition: Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
black/mysterious
martial/military
surname Wu
Xuanwu (Black tortoise) district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
basalt (geology)/lava
pillow lava (geology)/pillow basalt
basalt/also written 玄熔岩[xuan2 rong2 yan2]
Xuanwu gate coup of June 626 in early Tang, in which Li Shimin 李世民 killed his brothers, seized the throne from his father as Emperor Taizong 唐太宗

sentences.english: The two most common types of igneous rocks are granite and basalt.
sentences.chinese: 兩種最普遍的火成岩是花崗岩和玄武岩。

sentences.english: Water fills in low areas of the basalt crust to form the world's oceans.
sentences.chinese: 水聚集在玄武岩地殼的低窪處形成了海洋。

sentences.english: The research and application of pultrusion for continuous fiber reinforced thermoplastic composites;
sentences.chinese: 研究用陝西略陽玄武岩礦石原料生產連續纖維的工藝。

sentences.english: No original relation was found between the xenoliths and the host basalt.
sentences.chinese: 上述捕虜體均與寄主玄武岩無成因關係。

sentences.english: The greenschists originated from a series of volcanic - sedimentary formations with intercalated intracontinental tholeiites.
sentences.chinese: 綠片岩原巖是一套含板內拉斑玄武岩的火山沉積建造。

sentences.english: And this origin exactly is "Sunmoon Mode" Lanhanzhi said.
sentences.chinese: 這個根源就是藍漢之說的“玄武模式”。

sentences.english: The basalt belongs to the sub-alkaline tholeiite series.
sentences.chinese: 玄武岩屬於亞鹼性系列中的拉斑玄武岩。

sentences.english: The basalt belongs to the sub-alkaline tholeiite series.
sentences.chinese: 玄武岩屬於亞鹼性系列中的拉斑玄武岩。

sentences.english: Most of Iceland’s rock is basalt, a type that is rich in both calcium and magnesium.
sentences.chinese: 冰島的岩石大多是玄武岩，富含鈣和鎂。

sentences.english: The quartz tholeiites may be the products of the melts of lithospheric mantle.
sentences.chinese: 石英拉斑玄武岩是岩石圈地幔的熔漿。

sentences.english: Lateritic crust of basalts is of zonal texture.
sentences.chinese: 玄武岩紅土殼具帝狀結構。

sentences.english: In addition to flower island, the rest of islands mostly constitute by the basalt and the deposition rock.
sentences.chinese: 除花嶼以外，其餘各島多由玄武岩與沉積岩所組成。

sentences.english: The basalts created in three different times has the characters of continental rift.
sentences.chinese: 區內所見的三期玄武岩，明顯具有大陸裂谷型特徵。

sentences.english: Everyone came to the Xuanwu Lake Park, riding the MTR.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都乘着地鐵來到了玄武湖公園。

sentences.english: The deposit is located in alkali basalt which is controlled by the secondary structural zones of the Dunha-Mishan fault.
sentences.chinese: 礦牀爲鹼性玄武岩，以位於大斷裂次級構造上爲特徵。

definition: Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
see 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2]
Bai Ze or White Marsh, legendary creature of ancient China
dark/hell/netherworld/hades
see 眥睚|眦睚[zi4 ya2]
mythological animal
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
Lord of profound heaven, major Daoist deity/aka Black Tortoise 玄武 or Black heavenly emperor 玄天上帝

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
God of heaven/Celestial emperor
black/mysterious
